description: Stylesheet for the Board component in a Tetris web game. It defines the layout and appearance of the game board, cells, and animations.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Main container for the Tetris game board, styled as a flexible column with shadows and borders.

classes.name: row
classes.description: Flex container for a row of cells in the game board.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Individual cell in the Tetris game, styled with borders and shadows.

classes.name: active
classes.description: Styles applied to active cells, enhancing visibility with shadows and brightness adjustments.

classes.name: clearing
classes.description: Animation styles for cells that are clearing, with a flash effect.

classes.name: ghost
classes.description: Styles for ghost cells to indicate where a piece will drop, with a blurred effect.

classes.name: gameover
classes.description: Styles for cells when the game is over, applying a grayscale and reduced opacity.
